name: State | 08 Resolve
description:
Resolve explores the sense of resolution and reflection. It is the final song from the debut album, State.

The work and animations featured in the State series represents the rebirth as an artist and is the culmination of five years of work. 

The album and animated series allowed a sense of liberation to create and make the Bases project what it is today. This work serves as the foundation.

This is the final animation in the series and it will not be minted elsewhere. 

Music by Darryl Kirchner
Artwork and animation by Darryl Kirchner
